[Home](./index.md) &gt; [opensearch-dashboards](./opensearch-dashboards.md) &gt; [SavedObjectTypeRegistry](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjecttyperegistry.md) &gt; [registerType](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjecttyperegistry.registertype.md)

## SavedObjectTypeRegistry.registerType() method

Register a [type](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectstype.md) inside the registry. A type can only be registered once. subsequent calls with the same type name will throw an error.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerType(type: SavedObjectsType): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [SavedObjectsType](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectstype.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
